org.knime.core.node

Interface NodeConfigureHelper


  • public interface NodeConfigureHelper
    Object passed to Node.configure(PortObjectSpec[], NodeConfigureHelper) in order to modify the output specs in case the node is wrapped and its output is modified.
    Author:
    ohl, University of Konstanz
    No public API: not to be extended by clients
    This interface is not intended to be extended by clients.
    No public API: not to be implemented by clients
    This interface is not intended to be implemented by clients.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PortObjectSpec[] postConfigure(PortObjectSpec[] inSpecs, PortObjectSpec[] nodeModelOutSpecs)
      Modifies the output table specs calculated by the NodeModel.configure(PortObjectSpec[]) method.
      void preConfigure()
      Called immediately before NodeModel's configure is called.

    • Method Detail

      • preConfigure

        void preConfigure()
           throws InvalidSettingsException
        Called immediately before NodeModel's configure is called. (Used to apply variables to the settings.)
        Throws:
        InvalidSettingsException - ...

      • postConfigure

        PortObjectSpec[] postConfigure(PortObjectSpec[] inSpecs,
                               PortObjectSpec[] nodeModelOutSpecs)
                        throws InvalidSettingsException
        Modifies the output table specs calculated by the NodeModel.configure(PortObjectSpec[]) method.
        Parameters:
        inSpecs - port object specs from predecessor node(s)
        nodeModelOutSpecs - the output specs created by the underlying node
        Returns:
        the output specs actually delivered at the node's output ports
        Throws:
        InvalidSettingsException - if the node can't be executed.
